page.title: 19FARM MACHINERY-CANON PYON
page.content: The premises of the old Crown Inn are now used by a firm of{agricultural {engineers}and suppliers of farm machinery.Until recently a family firm it is now a partnership with offices in Hereford Market.It mainly deals in {potato harvesting machinery.}Their sales area covers Hereford & Worcester Salop,Gloucestershire and all the way to Pembrokeshire.They deal in new and second hand products except tractors. Most of their business and{profit comes from the sale of{spare parts}and the repair of faulty equipment.This often means their mechanics have to travel to remote farms in all weathers to carry out urgent repairs.Harvest time is their busiest season.Foreign makes have mostly taken over from British manufacturers because they are cheaper.Many British firms have and are still going out of business.
